attributes.action: do everything in his power to prevent the demolition of Argos Hill Windmill in Sussex
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Argos Hill Windmill is a very significant mill because its main post is constructed of four pieces of timber, there being only one other like this surviving.

Wealden District Council, the owners, are proposing to demolish the mill and build houses on the site. The mill was sold to their predecessors (Uckfield Districk Council) to be maintained in perpetuity for the benifit of the public. The mill is in a bad state of repair because WDC have not maintained it correctly, despite it being a listed building.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
